trans-unit.source: Used in order to associate or attach additional information to the instance of an object.

This is used by the [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/includes/wfd1-md.md)] in order to keep track of interesting pieces of data during an editing session for data that is otherwise transient, that will (mostly) be discarded at the end of an editing session.
<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.AttachedProperty> is useful as items in the `View` can bind to the values and react to changes.
For instance, this is the way that the selected item template is displayed (it keys off of an attached property for selection).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.AttachedProperty"></xref> class.
Retrieves the value of the specified model item.
The model item.
Returns a <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that contains the value of the model item.
Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.AttachedProperty"></xref> is browsable.

The primary impact of setting this to `true` is that the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.AttachedProperty> will be discoverable within the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem.Properties%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem> to which it is attached.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.AttachedProperty"></xref> is browsable; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that determines whether the attached property is read-only.
`true` if the property is read-only; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the name of the property.
Returns a <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the name of the property.
Creates a notification that indicates that the specified model item has changed.
The item that has changed.
Gets or sets the owner type.
Returns a <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that contains the owner type.
Resets the specified model item to the default value.
The model item to reset.
Sets the specified model item to the specified value.
The model item to set.
The value to set.
Gets the type.
Returns a <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that contains the type.
